articles.title: FIFA documentary on Sunil Chhetri: What's it about, what worked and what didn't - ESPN India
articles.description: The making of 'captain, leader, legend.' It's a story of how a boy from Delhi grew into the finest footballer India has seen this century.
articles.content: FIFA has released a documentary based on Sunil Chhetri, called 'Captain Fantastic' on their streaming platform FIFA plus. It's a three-part mini-series and it is being shared widely. We watched it to… [+3174 chars]

articles.author: TN Sports Desk
articles.title: Viral thread exposes Jos Buttler after his comments on run out; reflects his mentality behind leaving crease e - Times Now
articles.description: A viral thread has exposed Jos Buttler and revealed that he left the crease more than often during The Hundred. The England white-ball captain has been run-out in this manner twice in his career so far.
